title: Bluetooth Audio Issue
body: I use a pair of bluetooth headphones while playing League. During gameplay the sounds from lol's audio will start to cracking and creating noise. I tested my music player during the issue, and the music is not disrupted at all. So prob not bluetooth's fault. Anyone help me out here?{{champion:32}}

replies.body: Thanks guys, i have just submitted the log. Appreciate the support.

Your issue might be due to a driver issue as DTN suggestion, or a hardware problem.  I also recommend reaching out to our tech team by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  I suggest using the [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) which will automatically gather a set of logs to help give us more context.  We'll look at your specific issue and help out!

You might need to reinstall, roll back, or update your audio and/or bluetooth drivers, and you may try changing your audio output from stereo or surround to the other. If that doesn't work I'd suggest submitting a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) for help.
